1.name: Exalted Lore
1.requirement: Journey to Auric Basin to unlock the Exalted Lore Mastery track.

levels.name: Exalted Markings
levels.description: Gain the knowledge to read Exalted markings. You can now decipher their words and gain access to secrets of their civilization.
levels.instruction: You can now interact with Exalted artifacts found in Auric Basin and the greater Maguuma Jungle.

levels.name: Exalted Acceptance
levels.description: Gain the trust of the strange and mysterious Exalted, giving you access to their services in the Forgotten City.
levels.instruction: You can now trade with the Exalted and their representatives. Mastery vendors can be found across the Maguuma Jungle and are marked by Mastery icons on the map.

levels.name: Exalted Assistance
levels.description: Learn to use Exalted Recall devices found in the Maguuma Jungle to summon an Exalted warrior to fight for a short while.
levels.instruction: You can interact with Exalted recall devices, summoning a helpful Exalted ally or enhancing the power of an already summoned ally.

levels.name: Exalted Purification
levels.description: Become honored among the Exalted by challenging their champion each day, and unlock their finest treasures within the Forgotten City.
levels.instruction: You can now fight the Tarnished Traitor found below the Forgotten City. Defeating the Tarnished Traitor will give you access to a reward chest once per day.

levels.name: Exalted Gathering
levels.description: Learn from the Exalted how to gather rare materials around the Maguuma Jungle. Learn to mine up Auric Slivers from ore nodes in Auric Basin.
levels.instruction: When mining ore while in Auric Basin, you will gain Auric Slivers in addition to normal materials. You also have a chance to mine special items from ore nodes all around the Heart of Maguuma.

2.name: Itzel Lore
2.requirement: Train Basic Gliding in the Gliding Mastery track to unlock the Itzel Lore Mastery track.

levels.name: Bouncing Mushrooms
levels.description: Learn how to land precisely and use the bouncing mushrooms found around the Heart of Maguuma to get to places previously impossible to reach.
levels.instruction: Bouncing mushrooms can be found all over the Heart of Maguuma. Jump on top of bouncing mushrooms to spring into the air.

levels.name: Itzel Language
levels.description: Learn the difficult dialect of the Itzel, endearing yourself to the local Itzel and gaining access to vendors with exclusive wares.
levels.instruction: You can now trade with the Itzel. Mastery vendors can be found across the Maguuma Jungle and are marked by Mastery icons on the map.

levels.name: Blazing Speed Mushrooms
levels.description: With stomach training, learn to ingest the speed-increasing mushrooms found scattered in the Heart of Maguuma. Run at blazing speeds with the help of nature!
levels.instruction: Blazing-speed mushrooms can be found all over the Heart of Maguuma. Simply move near or through a blazing-speed mushroom to get a speed boost.

levels.name: Itzel Poison Lore
levels.description: Learn about Itzel poisons, and gain the ability to pass through poisonous Mordrem vines and withstand poison hazes that exist in Maguuma.
levels.instruction: You can now enter poison haze areas and pass through poisonous Mordrem vines without taking damage.

levels.name: Itzel Leadership
levels.description: Carefully study the Itzel fighting style and then challenge their enemy's champion to claim a valuable daily prize.
levels.instruction: You can now fight Mayatl the Fierce by speaking to the Itzel bladedancer outside the Jaka Itzel village. Defeating this champion gives you access to a reward chest once per day.

levels.name: Adrenal Mushrooms
levels.description: Learning to eat these mushrooms tweaks your adrenal glands, giving you a surge of adrenaline and instantly refreshing your skills.
levels.instruction: Adrenal mushrooms can be found rarely in the Heart of Maguuma. Simply move near or pass through adrenal mushrooms to have all your skills instantly refreshed.

3.name: Nuhoch Lore
3.requirement: Journey to Tangled Depths to unlock the Nuhoch Lore Mastery track.

levels.name: Nuhoch Hunting
levels.description: Learn to take special trophies from foes in Maguuma and to harvest Sawgill mushrooms, unlocking rare collections and items.
levels.instruction: You will now have a chance to loot special items off of any creature killed in the Heart of Maguuma. You can also harvest sawgill mushrooms, which can be found all over the Maguuma Jungle.

levels.name: Nuhoch Wallows
levels.description: Master the use of Nuhoch Wallows, learning to traverse these hidden passages to gain access to locations both far and hidden.
levels.instruction: You can now interact with Nuhoch wallows. Doing so will instantly transport you between wallow entrances and exits in the Maguuma Jungle.

levels.name: Nuhoch Language
levels.description: Learn the Nuhoch's traditional language, and gain the ability to trade and converse with the more wary members of the group.
levels.instruction: You can now trade with the Nuhoch. Mastery vendors can be found across the Maguuma Jungle and are marked by Mastery icons on the map.

levels.name: Nuhoch Stealth Detection
levels.description: Learn to spot enemies that practice stealth techniques, rendering them visible to your trained eye.
levels.instruction: You can now see creatures that are normally invisible in the Maguuma Jungle. Creatures that are hidden will appear to you as highlighted and can now be easily found or avoided.

levels.name: Nuhoch Proving
levels.description: Challenge the Nuhoch champion in combat to earn the Nuhoch's respect and unlock a powerful cache of rewards.
levels.instruction: You can now fight Potoni the Massive in Teku Nuhoch. Defeating Potoni the Massive gives you access to a reward chest once per day.

levels.name: Nuhoch Alchemy
levels.description: Train with the Nuhoch to learn to remove the chak's powerful acid. Without this ability, chak acid can obliterate foes.
levels.instruction: Evading will now instantly remove all stacks of chak goop affecting you. You are also immune to the slowing effects of goop.

levels.name: Pact Mentor
levels.description: Learn to be a mentor to the heroes of Tyria, gaining a special Mentoring Badge, chat title, and swiftness for you and your party in all cities.
levels.instruction: You can now use the Mentoring Badge accessible in the Party menu and the Mentor chat title activated through the mentor slash command. Your party now has a permanent  5% swiftness bonus in cities.

levels.name: Productive Downtime
levels.description: Learn to be more efficient and gain bonus experience when crafting.
levels.instruction: You now gain a bonus 10% experience from all crafting that grants experience. You also have a 10% higher chance of critical bonus crafting experience.

levels.name: Supply Line Management
levels.description: Gain access to a network of regional merchants across Tyria with a limited supply of rare goods for trade, and increase your party's swiftness bonus in cities to 15%.
levels.instruction: You can now trade with the Pact Supply Network Agents who travel across Central Tyria. You can purchase one item from each agent each day in exchange for karma. Your party now has a permanent 15% swiftness bonus while in cities.

levels.name: Noblesse Oblige
levels.description: Learn to revive your allies faster and with less penalties.
levels.instruction:
You can now revive allied players faster and remove durability and downed penalties on a successful revive. The revive speed is increased further when the level of the character being revived is lower than your own.

Note: This effect is disabled while challenge mode has been activated in raids, Strike Missions, or Convergences.

levels.name: Advanced Logistics
levels.description: Learn to automatically pick up loot from fallen foes and gain a greater swiftness bonus for your party in cities.
levels.instruction: You now have the option to have loot from creatures you defeat be deposited automatically into your inventory. This ability can be turned off in the Options menu. Your party now has a permanent 33% swiftness bonus in cities.

levels.name: Follows Advice
levels.description: With Dessa's authorization, gain access to additional daily achievements and special vendors with unique items inside the Mistlock Observatory.
levels.instruction: You have unlocked additional daily achievements for fractal scales 21–49. You can also now access vendors with special items inside the Mistlock Observatory.

levels.name: Agony Channeler
levels.description: Prolonged exposure to agony will result in improved rewards inside fractal dungeons. You'll also gain access to Mystic Forge recipes for adding extra agony infusion slots to ascended rings. Mist potions will give bonus attributes.
levels.instruction: You now receive bonus rewards from fractal dungeon boss chests. Vendors now sell ingredients for attuning rings in the Mystic Forge, which provide additional agony resistance slots on your ascended and infused rings. Mist potions will also convert a percentage of your agony resistance to specific attributes, depending on the potion used.

levels.name: Recursive Resourcing
levels.description: Greater attunement with the fractals will grant bonus rewards from Chests of the Mists as well as Unlocked Fractal Encryptions. Fractal potion conversion also improves.
levels.instruction: You now gain bonus rewards from Chests of the Mists and Fractal Encryptions. Mist potion conversion has improved.

levels.name: Mistlock Singularities
levels.description: Research how to activate the lifesaving Mistlock Singularities within the Fractals of the Mists. Fractal potion conversion improves.
levels.instruction: You can now activate Mistlock Singularities inside Fractals of the Mists to gain instant skill recharge, additional agony resistance, and a shield that can prevent death inside fractal dungeons. Fractal potion conversion has improved.

levels.name: Revered Antiquarian
levels.description: Learn to start the process of creating a legendary weapon by unlocking access to the first tier of precursor weapon collections.
levels.instruction: You can now speak to Grandmaster Craftsman Hobbs in Lion's Arch to begin the first-tier precursor weapon collection for any legendary weapon.

levels.name: Magister of Legends
levels.description: Learn about components necessary for the creation of second-tier precursor weapons.
levels.instruction: You can now purchase components necessary for the creation of second-tier precursor weapons from Grandmaster Craftsman Hobbs in Lion's Arch.

levels.name: Historian of the Armaments
levels.description: Learn about components needed to create the third and final tier of precursor weapons.
levels.instruction: You can now purchase components necessary for the creation of third-tier precursor weapons from Grandmaster Craftsman Hobbs in Lion's Arch.

levels.name: Scholar of Secrets
levels.description: Learn about legendary weapon collections used to craft Heart of Thorns legendary weapons. Train this Mastery to be able to purchase Mystic Runestones from Miyani and Mystic Forge attendants to use in the creation of legendary equipment from expansions.
levels.instruction:
You can now purchase components necessary for the creation of Heart of Thorns legendary weapons from Grandmaster Craftsman Hobbs in Lion's Arch.
Additionally, you can purchase Mystic Runestones from Miyani and Mystic Forge attendants for the creation of legendary equipment from expansions.

8.name: Gliding
8.requirement: Journey to the Heart of Maguuma and complete the story step "Torn from the Sky" to unlock access to the Gliding Mastery track.

levels.name: Glider Basics
levels.description: Gain access to a glider so that you can glide across the highest points of the Heart of Maguuma as well as Central Tyrian open-world maps.
levels.instruction: To glide, jump from a high place, and then press the jump key again while falling.

levels.name: Updraft Use
levels.description: Improved design to your glider handles and wing slits lets you confidently fly into updrafts, allowing you to gain altitude and travel to previously unreachable locations.
levels.instruction: Updrafts are pillars of swirling wind found around the Maguuma Jungle. To use updrafts, simply glide into them and receive an elevation boost.

levels.name: Lean Techniques
levels.description: Learn the gliding technique of leaning forward to increase your gliding speed and leaning back to brake midair at the cost of endurance. Your improved technique also increases your total endurance pool when gliding.
levels.instruction: To lean in, press forward while gliding and get a speed boost. To lean back, press back while gliding to brake.

levels.name: Stealth Gliding
levels.description: Learn to glide silently and undetected through the air for short periods by dodging while gliding.
levels.instruction: To activate stealth, perform a dodge by double-tapping in any direction while gliding.

levels.name: Advanced Gliding
levels.description: Learn to glide with such efficiency that you no longer use endurance to stay up in the air, only to perform lean techniques.
levels.instruction: You can now glide indefinitely without using endurance. Leaning still drains endurance.

levels.name: Ley Line Gliding
levels.description: Learn to enter ley-line energy flows while gliding to be moved along with the flow, gaining access to otherwise inaccessible places.
levels.instruction: Ley lines are flows of magical energy that can be seen around the Maguuma Jungle. To use ley lines, simply glide into them and allow the energy flow to move you along.

12.name: Raids
12.requirement: Enter the Forsaken Thicket in Verdant Brink and defeat a boss to unlock.

levels.name: Rift Forger
levels.description: Learn to reinforce your armor by manipulating energy from ley rifts that appear when you defeat a powerful enemy.
levels.instruction: Reinforce your armor using ley rifts in places where you've defeated a powerful enemy.

levels.name: Explosive Launch
levels.description: The dwarves may have invented black powder, but you can perfect its use. Learn to safely launch to great heights with an explosive blast, without singeing your socks.
levels.instruction: You now take no damage when you or an ally launches you off of an explosive launch platform.

levels.name: Forsaken Thicket Waters
levels.description: The waters in Forsaken Thicket are known to have cleansing properties that can cure various afflictions. Those who possess this Mastery can wash away their ailments and afflictions when the opportunity presents itself.
levels.instruction: You can now bathe in the healing Forsaken Thicket waters and cleanse your afflictions.

levels.name: Forsaken Magic
levels.description: Learn to harness the powerful energy permeating the Forsaken Thicket and gain advantages in battle.
levels.instruction: You now understand the magic of the Forsaken Thicket.

13.name: Ancient Magics
13.requirement: Travel to Bloodstone Fen or Ember Bay to unlock.

levels.name: Counter Magic
levels.description: Based on ancient asuran research done by the supergenius Zinn, Taimi has devised a way to counter certain powerful magic abilities. Learn this Mastery to gain access to the Counter Magic special action skill that allows you to turn your enemy's attacks back on themselves.
levels.instruction: Use the Counter Magic special action skill to cancel certain powerful, magical abilities used by enemies.

levels.name: Thermal Propulsion
levels.description: When the dwarves took on Primordus, they learned much about traveling through Tyria's heated core. Learn this Mastery to travel long distances as the dwarves did.
levels.instruction: Employ thermal propulsion to travel long distances.

levels.name: Koda's Flame
levels.description: Grants the ability to wield kodan fire magic based on a flame spirit that has been tamed since ancient times. Learning this Mastery will unlock the first skill while carrying Koda's Flame. Visit kodan flamebearers to learn additional skills.
levels.instruction: Pick up a Koda's Flame torch from the braziers spread throughout Bitterfrost Frontier and Tyria.

levels.name: Spectral Aid
levels.description: Ancient magics still linger in the world of Tyria, and those especially attuned to them can sometimes call on them in times of great need. Learn this mastery to unlock an extra skill for use while downed.
levels.instruction: When you are downed, consider using your new skill to fend off remaining foes.

levels.name: Oakheart's Reach
levels.description: Ancient druids had the power to manipulate nature. Learn this Mastery to gather Oakheart's essence, which allows you to grapple to new heights using magical vines.
levels.instruction: Find one of Oakheart's essences to gain the ability to launch yourself to targeted points. This skill can also be used while gliding.

levels.name: Siren of Orr
levels.description: Ancient chords of long-forgotten lamentations still echo in Orr. Those who have learned to listen for them are able to use dirges of power, making manifest abilities once lost to the pages of history.
levels.instruction: Whenever a Chancel of Echoes appears during combat, interact with it to acquire a random dirge. Perform these dirges to help allies and hinder foes.

14.name: Raptor Mount
14.requirement: Complete the Seeker's Village task region in Oasis to unlock the Raptor Mastery Track.

levels.name: Ravenous Strike
levels.description: Understand the true ravenous nature of the raptor, greatly increasing the damage of Tail Spin.
levels.instruction: Tail Spin now deals greatly increased damage to foes.

levels.name: Round up
levels.description: Learn to round up foes when using Tail Spin, pulling them in to your location.
levels.instruction: Tail Spin now pulls in foes to your location, grouping them up for combat.

levels.name: Canyon Jumping
levels.description: Learn to leap much farther with the raptor's movement ability, allowing you to traverse even more rough terrain.
levels.instruction: The leap movement ability will now travel much farther distances.

levels.name: Ravenous Discipline
levels.description: Master the raptor mount and learn to share the bonus from Ravenous Strike to all mount engage skills.
levels.instruction: All mounts now receive the bonus from Ravenous Strike, increasing their engage skill damage.

15.name: Skimmer Mount
15.requirement: Complete the Skimmer Ranch task region in Elon Riverlands to unlock the Skimmer Mastery Track.

levels.name: Nimble Recovery
levels.description: Learn to nimbly recover after being knocked off the skimmer and after engaging foes by using Barrel Roll. The skimmer will now grant you protection and swiftness when you're recovering.
levels.instruction: You'll now be granted swiftness and protection after getting knocked off your mount, or after engaging foes with Barrel Roll. (Cooldown: 10s)

levels.name: Rejuvenating Revival
levels.description: Learn to enhance the rejuvenating properties of Barrel Roll to also heal downed allies.
levels.instruction: You can now heal downed allies when you pass through them with Barrel Roll.

levels.name: Ride the Wind
levels.description: Learn to ride the wind and increase the height of the hover movement ability to conquer new challenges.
levels.instruction: The hover movement ability now hovers at a much greater height.

levels.name: Nimble Benevolence
levels.description: Master the skimmer and learn to share the bonus from Nimble Recovery with all mounts.
levels.instruction: All mounts now receive the bonus from Nimble Recovery. Getting knocked off your mount or engaging foes will grant swiftness and protection. (Cooldown: 10s)

levels.name: Skimming the Depths
levels.description: Use all you've learned to teach your skimmer to dive underwater.
levels.instruction: Train your skimmer to dive below the water's surface.

16.name: Griffon Mount
16.requirement: Complete the Griffon Training adventure in the Domain of Vabbi to unlock the Griffon Mastery Track.

levels.name: Soaring Rescue
levels.description: Learn to mount the griffon midair to save yourself while falling.
levels.instruction: You can now mount and dismount your griffon in midair. While aloft, use the mount hotkey to hop on or off of the griffon.

levels.name: Aerial Prowess
levels.description: Learn to gain aerial prowess with your griffon. Use Swoop to dive rapidly and engage foes below you. Use this momentum to pull up from a dive to fly forward at great speeds, or even directly upward.
levels.instruction: Use Swoop to dive toward the ground and engage foes below you, or enter the diving state by using movement ability 1. When you gain substantial diving speed, use movement ability 2 or the backward-movement key binds to carry your momentum upward.

levels.name: Aerial Finesse
levels.description: Master the griffon by learning to use its Wing Flap ability, which allows you to gain a burst of speed while diving or climbing into the sky.
levels.instruction: Wing Flap can now be used while diving and pulling up to gain a burst of speed in your movement direction.

17.name: Springer Mount
17.requirement: Complete the Highjump Ranch task region in Desert Highlands to unlock the Springer Mastery Track.

levels.name: Fortified Descent
levels.description: Learn to fortify your landing when falling from great heights, greatly increasing your tolerance for taking fall damage on the springer.
levels.instruction: The springer will now have a greater tolerance to taking fall damage, allowing you to safely fall from higher locations.

levels.name: Forceful Impact
levels.description: Learn to create a more forceful impact when using Cannonball, knocking down foes.
levels.instruction: Cannonball will now knock down foes, leaving them disabled as you engage them.

levels.name: High Vault
levels.description: Learn to jump up much higher with the springer's movement ability, allowing you to reach new and previously unexplorable areas.
levels.instruction: The springer's charged jump movement ability will now be able to jump much higher distances.

levels.name: Masterful Descent
levels.description: Master the springer mount and learn to share the bonus from Fortified Descent to all other mounts.
levels.instruction: All mounts now receive the bonus from Fortified Descent, giving them a greater tolerance to taking fall damage.

18.name: Jackal Mount
18.requirement: Complete the Sand Jackal Run task region in the Desolation to unlock the Jackal Mastery Track.

levels.name: Enhanced Evasion
levels.description: Learn to evade attacks while using the jackal's movement ability, and use it at opportune times to avoid large attacks.
levels.instruction: The jackal's movement ability now lets you evade all incoming attacks. Press jump or mount ability 1 to activate the ability.

levels.name: Bolster Allies
levels.description: Learn to use the jackal's sand to bolster allies when using Pounce, granting nearby allies a strong barrier.
levels.instruction: Pounce will now grant nearby allies a strong barrier.

levels.name: Shifting Sands
levels.description: Learn to shift through the sand portals found throughout the desert to reach new and hidden locations.
levels.instruction: You may now use sand portals to phase to new locations while riding the jackal.

levels.name: Adroit Evasion
levels.description: Master the jackal and learn to share the bonus from Enhanced Evasion with all mounts through their movement abilities.
levels.instruction: All mounts now receive the Enhanced Evasion bonus, allowing their movement abilities to evade hostile attacks.

19.name: Crystal Champion
19.requirement: Travel to the Domain of Istan to unlock.

levels.name: Volatile Magic Resonance
levels.description: Master your bond with Aurene so that you can safely collect Volatile Magic.
levels.instruction: Aurene has gifted you the ability to harvest Volatile Magic, which would otherwise be hazardous to touch.

levels.name: Bond of Life
levels.description: Master your bond with Aurene so that she can let you share your health with your mount.
levels.instruction: Aurene has granted you the ability to temporarily share your health pool with your active mount.

levels.name: Bond of Vigor
levels.description: Master your bond with Aurene so that she can let you rejuvenate your mount's endurance.
levels.instruction: Aurene has granted you the ability to rejuvenate the endurance of your active mount.

levels.name: Bond of Faith
levels.description: Master your bond with Aurene so that she can lend you magical wings, allowing you to launch from your mounts.
levels.instruction: Your bond with Aurene has granted you the ability to launch off of mounts.

20.name: Roller Beetle Mount
20.requirement: Complete the roller beetle mount collection to unlock the roller beetle Mastery track.

levels.name: Wrecking Ball
levels.description: Learn to launch foes a short distance by rolling over them with the roller beetle's engage skill, Roll Out.
levels.instruction: Roll Out damages foes as you roll over them and launches them a short distance.

levels.name: Barrier Smash
levels.description: Smash your way into secret areas and destroy volatile crystals with your roller beetle. Recover endurance when your beetle hits walls.
levels.instruction: Use your roller beetle's boost ability or Roll Out skill to smash through marked blockades and destroy volatile crystals. Recover endurance when your beetle collides with walls at high speed.

levels.name: Big Air
levels.description: Learn to perform stylish airborne tricks after boosting to regain endurance.
levels.instruction: Press and hold the jump button after boosting and catching air to perform stylish tricks. Tricks remain active and replenish endurance while the jump button is held. An endurance penalty will be administered for improper landings.

21.name: Skyscale Mount
21.requirement: Complete the skyscale mount collections to unlock the skyscale Mastery track.

levels.name: Air Rescue
levels.description: Learn to mount the skyscale in midair to save yourself while falling.
levels.instruction: You can now mount and dismount your skyscale in midair. While aloft, use the mount hotkey to hop on or off of the skyscale.

levels.name: Rift Repair
levels.description: Learn to use your skyscale's magic resources to close rifts. This will draw out the magic trapped within and reveal new flight paths.
levels.instruction: Hovering next to rifts will close them and reveal flight paths for your skyscale. Follow them to claim the treasure at the end. But don't miss a node along the way! Your final reward is largest if you touch every node.

levels.name: Wall Launch
levels.description: Learn to launch off walls with your skyscale, providing a moment of respite and the ability to fly to greater heights.
levels.instruction: While clinging to a wall with your skyscale, hold the jump key to charge your flight meter, and release it to launch into the air. This requires at least one bar of endurance.

levels.name: Essence of Resilience Tier 1
levels.description: Connect with the Essence of Resilience and gain an advantage over valor.
levels.instruction: Your connection to the Essence of Resilience has given you greater combat abilities against valor.

levels.name: Essence of Resilience Tier 2
levels.description: Connect with the Essence of Resilience and gain an advantage over valor.
levels.instruction: Your connection to the Essence of Resilience has given you greater combat abilities against valor.

levels.name: Essence of Resilience Tier 3
levels.description: Connect with the Essence of Resilience and gain an advantage over valor.
levels.instruction: Your connection to the Essence of Resilience has given you greater combat abilities against valor.

levels.name: Essence of Resilience Tier 4
levels.description: Connect with the Essence of Resilience and gain an advantage over valor.
levels.instruction: Your connection to the Essence of Resilience has given you greater combat abilities against valor. Spirit Nova can now be used on creatures of any essence.

23.name: Raven Attunement
23.requirement: Travel to Bjora Marches to unlock.

levels.name: Raven Bond
levels.description: Master your bond with Raven Spirit to open Raven locks.
levels.instruction: You can now unlock Raven locks.

levels.name: Raven's Light
levels.description: Master your bond with Raven to activate Raven barriers and Raven light shrines.
levels.instruction: You can now activate Raven barriers and Raven light shrines.

levels.name: Raven's Flight
levels.description: Master your bond with Raven to pass through Raven gates.
levels.instruction: Use the Raven's Lens to interact with Raven gates.

levels.name: Raven Bright
levels.description: Master your bond with Raven and receive greater bonuses from Raven gates and barrier shrines.
levels.instruction: Barrier duration doubled. Using Raven gates grants a speed boost.

levels.name: Essence of Vigilance Tier 1
levels.description: Connect with the Essence of Vigilance and gain an advantage over resilience.
levels.instruction: Your connection to the Essence of Vigilance has given you greater combat abilities against resilience.

levels.name: Essence of Vigilance Tier 2
levels.description: Connect with the Essence of Vigilance and gain an advantage over resilience.
levels.instruction: Your connection to the Essence of Vigilance has given you greater combat abilities against resilience.

levels.name: Essence of Vigilance Tier 3
levels.description: Connect with the Essence of Vigilance and gain an advantage over resilience.
levels.instruction: Your connection to the Essence of Vigilance has given you greater combat abilities against resilience.

levels.name: Essence of Vigilance Tier 4
levels.description: Connect with the Essence of Vigilance and gain an advantage over resilience.
levels.instruction: Your connection to the Essence of Vigilance has given you greater combat abilities against resilience. Shattered Psyche can now be used on creatures of any essence.

levels.name: Essence of Valor Tier 1
levels.description: Connect with the Essence of Valor and gain an advantage over vigilance.
levels.instruction: Your connection to the Essence of Valor has given you greater combat abilities against vigilance.

levels.name: Essence of Valor Tier 2
levels.description: Connect with the Essence of Valor and gain an advantage over vigilance.
levels.instruction: Your connection to the Essence of Valor has given you greater combat abilities against vigilance.

levels.name: Essence of Valor Tier 3
levels.description: Connect with the Essence of Valor and gain an advantage over vigilance.
levels.instruction: Your connection to the Essence of Valor has given you greater combat abilities against vigilance.

levels.name: Essence of Valor Tier 4
levels.description: Connect with the Essence of Valor and gain an advantage over vigilance.
levels.instruction: Your connection to the Essence of Valor has given you greater combat abilities against vigilance. Night Terror can now be used on creatures of any essence.

26.name: United Legions Waystation Synchronization
26.requirement: Travel to Drizzlewood Coast to unlock.

levels.name: Electromagical Pulse
levels.description: Interact with United Legions Waystations in Drizzlewood Coast, and obtain an Ash Legion Electromagical Pulse special action skill.
levels.instruction: You can now interact with United Legions Waystations in the Drizzlewood Coast and obtain the Ash Legion EMP special action skill.

levels.name: Remote Charge
levels.description: Adds an Iron Legion Remote Charge special action skill to the United Legions Waystation options.
levels.instruction: You can now select the Iron Legion Remote Charge special action skill from United Legions Waystations.

levels.name: Portable Waystation
levels.description: Use one-time consumables to construct portable waystations anywhere in the open world.
levels.instruction: You can now purchase consumables from United Legions Waystations that will deploy a portable waystation at your location.

levels.name: Iron Legion Medizooka
levels.description: Adds the Medizooka special action ability to United Legions waystation options.
levels.instruction: You can now select the Medizooka special action ability from United Legions waystations.

levels.name: Ash Legion Mount Stealth
levels.description: Master using Ash Legion tech to allow the use of stealth when mounted.
levels.instruction: The Ash Legion has trained you to apply stealth to your mount, allowing you to avoid combat.

levels.name: United Legions Waystation Mastery
levels.description: Master usage of United Legions waystations by upgrading associated abilities.
levels.instruction: Abilities from United Legions waystations are now more powerful.

27.name: Dragon Slayer
27.requirement: Receive a boon from your ally in Eye of the North.

levels.name: Dragon's Boon
levels.description:
Destroy dragon minions in Dragon Response Missions to seize Dragon Essence and gain a temporary boost to your stats.
Defeating a dragon champion in a Dragon Response Mission allows you to seize a Dragon Boon that can carry this boost into another Dragon Response Mission.
levels.instruction:
Destroy dragon minions in Dragon Response Missions to gain a temporary boost to your stats.
Defeating a dragon champion in a Dragon Response Mission allows you to seize a Dragon Boon that can carry this boost into another Dragon Response Mission.

levels.name: Crystal Forger
levels.description:
Defeating a dragon champion in a Dragon Response Mission grants additional materials while under the effect of a Dragon Boon.
Seizing Dragon Essence now grants additional might.
You can now purchase recipes for Dragon Slayer weapons from vendors in Eye of the North.
levels.instruction:
Defeating a dragon champion in a Dragon Response Mission grants additional materials while under the effect of a Dragon Boon.
Seizing Dragon Essence now grants additional might.
You can now purchase recipes for Dragon Slayer weapons from vendors in Eye of the North.

levels.name: Great Champion
levels.description:
When an allied faction aids you in a Dragon Response mission, you gain an enhancement to your stats.
While wielding Dragon Essence, your critical hits now inflict a condition based on the essence.
The allied faction weekly vendor now carries additional items.
levels.instruction:
When an allied faction aids you in a Dragon Response Mission, you gain an enhancement to your stats.
While wielding Dragon Essence, your critical hits now inflict a condition based on the essence.
The allied faction weekly vendor now carries additional items.

levels.name: Blade of Prophecy
levels.description:
Defeating a dragon champion in a Dragon Response Mission grants additional materials while under the effect of an opposed dragon's Dragon Boon.
While wielding Dragon Essence, activating your heal skill now grants a boon based on the essence.
You can now purchase recipes for improved Dragon Slayer weapons from vendors in Eye of the North.
levels.instruction:
Defeating a dragon champion in a Dragon Response Mission grants additional materials while under the effect of an opposed dragon's Dragon Boon.
While wielding Dragon Essence, activating your heal skill now grants a boon based on the essence.
You can now purchase recipes for improved Dragon Slayer weapons from vendors in Eye of the North.

levels.name: Shining Champion
levels.description:
When an allied faction aids you in a Dragon Response Mission, you have improved skill at taking advantage of their assistance.
While wielding Dragon Essence, dodging now removes a specific condition based on the essence.
The allied faction weekly vendor now carries additional items.
levels.instruction:
When an allied faction aids you in a Dragon Response Mission, you have improved skill at taking advantage of their assistance.
While wielding Dragon Essence, dodging now removes a specific condition based on the essence.
The allied faction weekly vendor now carries additional items.

levels.name: Reins of Power
levels.description:
Defeating a dragon champion in a Dragon Response Mission grants additional materials while under the effect of the Dragon Boon of two Elder Dragons.
While wielding multiple Dragon Essences, activating your elite skill now grants might, fury, and stability.
You can now purchase recipes for superior Dragon Slayer weapons from vendors in Eye of the North.
levels.instruction:
Defeating a dragon champion in a Dragon Response Mission grants additional materials while under the effect of the Dragon Boon of two Elder Dragons.
While wielding multiple Dragon Essences, activating your elite skill now grants might, fury, and stability.
You can now purchase recipes for superior Dragon Slayer weapons from vendors in Eye of the North.

levels.name: Dragon Slayer
levels.description:
The duration of boons granted by Dragon Essence is increased.
During the climax of the Icebrood Saga, you can seize Dragon Essence from certain sources.
levels.instruction:
The duration of boons granted by Dragon Essence is increased.
During the climax of the Icebrood Saga, you can seize Dragon Essence from certain sources.

29.name: Skiff Piloting
29.requirement: Complete the Shinota Shore renown heart in Seitung Province to unlock the Skiff Piloting Mastery Track.

levels.name: Full Throttle
levels.description:
Learn how to push your skiff to a new top speed.

Increases your skiff's hit points by 2,500.
levels.instruction:
Learn how to push your skiff to a new top speed.

Increases your skiff's hit points by 2,500.

levels.name: Depth Charges
levels.description:
Learn a new skill that sinks enemies swimming close to your skiff.

Increases your skiff's hit points by 2,500.
levels.instruction:
Learn a new skill that sinks enemies swimming close to your skiff.

Increases your skiff's hit points by 2,500.

levels.name: Speed Boost
levels.description:
Learn how to give your skiff a short burst of speed.

Increases your skiff's hit points by 2,500.
levels.instruction:
Learn how to give your skiff a short burst of speed.

Increases your skiff's hit points by 2,500.

levels.name: Fishing Party
levels.description:
While on your skiff, you and your party or squad members receive an amount of fishing power based on your total number of catches from fishing nodes.

Increases your skiff's hit points by 2,500.
levels.instruction:
While on your skiff, you and your party or squad members receive an amount of fishing power based on your total number of catches from fishing nodes.

Increases your skiff's hit points by 2,500.

levels.name: Turtle Health Boost
levels.description: Bond with your turtle to increase its health by 50%.
levels.instruction: Your turtle's health is now increased by 50%.

levels.name: Slam Mastery
levels.description: Learn how to generate ammo after successfully hitting a target with Slam.
levels.instruction: Your turtle's Slam will now generate 25% of an artillery shot per enemy struck.

levels.name: Improved Jump Jets
levels.description: Learn how to get your turtle to make the most of its jump jets.
levels.instruction: Your turtle can now jump farther and higher using its jump jets.

levels.name: Power Shell
levels.description: Master your skill as a gunner, learning to convert incoming damage into ammo.
levels.instruction: You've learned Power Shell, allowing you to convert incoming damage into ammo from the passenger seat.

levels.name: Sharing Is Caring
levels.description: Learn how to teach the turtle health boost to all your other mounts.
levels.instruction: Your turtle's health boost will now be applied to all other mounts.

31.name: Fishing
31.requirement: Complete the chapter Old Friends in the End of Dragons story.

levels.name: Fishing Hole Master
levels.description:
Reduces time to catch at fishing holes and triples the XP gained from fishing there.

Adds +20 to base fishing power.
levels.instruction:
Reduces time to catch at fishing holes and triples the XP gained from fishing there.

Adds +20 to base fishing power.

levels.name: Angler Sense
levels.description:
Grants a skill that detects nearby fishing hot spots and marks them on the map.

Adds +20 to base fishing power.
levels.instruction:
Grants a skill that detects nearby fishing hot spots and marks them on the map.

Adds +20 to base fishing power.

levels.name: Fishing on a Full Tank
levels.description:
Bonus +100 to fishing power while nourished.

Adds +20 to base fishing power.
levels.instruction:
Bonus +100 to fishing power while nourished.

Adds +20 to base fishing power.

levels.name: Master Caster
levels.description:
Increases your maximum casting range by 50%.

Adds +20 to base fishing power.
levels.instruction:
Increases your maximum casting range by 50%.

Adds +20 to base fishing power.

levels.name: Local Legend
levels.description:
Fishmongers and fishing merchants around Cantha now offer you exclusive selections.

Adds +20 to base fishing power.
levels.instruction:
Fishmongers and fishing merchants around Cantha now offer you exclusive selections.

Adds +20 to base fishing power.

32.name: Arborstone Revitalization
32.requirement: Complete the chapter Fallout in the End of Dragons story.

levels.name: Base of Operations
levels.description:
Establish a base of operations within Arborstone.

Increases the resting experience enhancement from Arborstone Inn by 5%.
levels.instruction:
Arborstone now has a fully functional base of operations.

Increased the resting experience enhancement from Arborstone Inn by 5%.

levels.name: Crafting Center
levels.description:
Establish a crafting center within Arborstone.

Increases the resting experience enhancement from Arborstone Inn by 5%.
levels.instruction:
Arborstone now has a crafting center established.

Increased the resting experience enhancement from Arborstone Inn by 5%.

levels.name: Entertaining Amenities
levels.description:
Establish entertainment areas within Arborstone.

Increases the resting experience enhancement from Arborstone Inn by 5%.
levels.instruction:
Arborstone now has more forms of entertainment for you and your allies.

Increased the resting experience enhancement from Arborstone Inn by 5%.

levels.name: Commercial Hub
levels.description:
Establish commerce operations within Arborstone.

Increases the resting experience enhancement from Arborstone Inn by 5%.
levels.instruction:
Arborstone now has a multitude of commerce operational enhancements.

Increased the resting experience enhancement from Arborstone Inn by 5%.

levels.name: Globalization
levels.description:
Establish global operations within Arborstone.

Increases the resting experience enhancement from Arborstone Inn by 5%.
levels.instruction:
Arborstone is now a fully realized, globalized hub with gateways opening up trade and travel beyond the borders of Cantha.

Increased the resting experience enhancement from Arborstone Inn by 5%.

33.name: Jade Bots
33.requirement: Complete the chapter The Scenic Route in the End of Dragons story.

levels.name: Gliding Booster
levels.description: Upgrade your jade bot to give you an upward boost while gliding.
levels.instruction:
Your jade bot can now give you an upward boost while you are gliding.
You can now craft tier 1 and tier 2 power cores.

levels.name: Multicharge
levels.description: Upgrade your jade bot to carry up to 4 jade energy charges at a time.
levels.instruction:
Your jade bot can now carry up to 4 jade energy charges at a time.
You can now craft tier 3 and tier 4 power cores.

levels.name: Jade Tech Waypoint
levels.description: Upgrade your jade bot to be able to set up a personal waypoint for you.
levels.instruction:
Your jade bot now has the ability to set up a personal waypoint for you.
You can now craft tier 5 and tier 6 power cores.

levels.name: Energy Efficiency
levels.description: Upgrade your jade bot to gather more energy from jade tech batteries. Additionally, your jade bot can now absorb energy from zip lines.
levels.instruction:
Your jade bot will now get 2 charges from jade batteries, to a maximum of 4. Your jade bot can now gather charges from zip lines.
You can now craft tier 7 and tier 8 power cores.

levels.name: Rescue Protocol
levels.description: Upgrade your jade bot to assist you in rallying when you are downed. This skill is not available in PvP, WvW, raids, fractals, or strikes.
levels.instruction:
Your jade bot now assists you in rallying when you are downed.
You can now craft tier 9 and tier 10 power cores.

36.name: Flight Training
36.requirement: Complete the Guild Wars 2: Secrets of the Obscure story chapter Hell Breaks Loose to unlock the Flight Training Mastery track.

levels.name: Who Rescues Whom?
levels.description:
Learn to mount the skyscale in midair to save yourself while falling. If you also have the Air Rescue Skyscale Mount Mastery trained, your skyscale may gain the Bond of Vigor effect shortly after mounting in midair.

Unlock the A New Friend achievement.
levels.instruction:
You can now mount and dismount your skyscale in midair. While aloft, use the mount hotkey to hop on or off of the skyscale.
If you also have Skyscale Mastery Air Rescue trained, your skyscale may gain the Bond of Vigor effect shortly after mounting in midair.

Complete the achievement A New Friend to summon your skyscale outside of Secrets of the Obscure maps.

levels.name: Fireball
levels.description: Unlock the ability for your skyscale to spit a fireball at aerial targets.
levels.instruction: Use the Fireball skill while on your skyscale to spit a fireball at aerial targets. Action camera can be used to enhance your accuracy.

levels.name: Wall Spring
levels.description: Learn to spring off walls with your skyscale, providing a moment of respite and the ability to fly to greater heights. If you also have the Wall Launch Skyscale Mount Mastery trained, this ability charges faster and launches farther when fully charged.
levels.instruction: While clinging to a wall with your skyscale, hold the jump key to charge your flight meter and release it to launch into the air. This requires at least one bar of endurance. If you also have the Wall Launch Skyscale Mount Mastery trained, this ability charges faster and launches farther.

levels.name: Enhanced Updrafts
levels.description: Learn to magically strengthen the power of updrafts to allow them to benefit your flying mounts.
levels.instruction: Updrafts are pillars of swirling wind. To use updrafts, simply fly your mount into them and receive an elevation boost.

levels.name: Combat Launch
levels.description: Learn to call on your skyscale during fights to carry you to safety or attack from a new angle.
levels.instruction: Open the Activate Mastery Skill panel and select Skyscale to launch yourself into the air and mount your skyscale. This can only be used once every 3 minutes.

levels.name: Ley-Line Acclimation
levels.description: Learn to enter ley-line energy flows while mounted to glide along with the flow, gaining speed and access to otherwise inaccessible places.
levels.instruction: Ley lines are flows of magical energy. To use ley lines, simply fly your mount into them and allow the energy flow to boost your mount along.

levels.name: Rising Spirits
levels.description: Learn to use magically enhanced updrafts to replenish your mount's endurance.
levels.instruction: Your flying mounts now gain flight endurance from updrafts and ley lines.

37.name: Astral Ward
37.requirement: Complete the Guild Wars 2: Secrets of the Obscure story chapter The Missing Facet to unlock the Astral Ward Mastery track.

levels.name: Astral Amenities
levels.description: Learn to channel the energies of the Wizard's Tower to rest and relax.
levels.instruction: Gain an experience enhancement while within the Wizard's Tower.

levels.name: Astral Craft
levels.description: Gain access to purchasing Astral Ward armor and the recipes to craft common and uncommon Kryptis Motivations for use in rift hunting.
levels.instruction:
Astral armor and motivation recipes can be purchased from Lyhr in the Wizard's Tower.
Uncommon Kryptis Motivations can be used with the Heart of the Obscure to find tier 2 Kryptis rifts. Using a motivation on a Kryptis rift results in bonus essences when it is sealed.

levels.name: Emotion Control
levels.description: Gain access to purchasing the recipe to craft rare Kryptis Motivations for use in rift hunting.
levels.instruction: Rare Kryptis Motivations can be used with the Heart of the Obscure to find tier 3 Kryptis rifts. Beware! These rifts should not be attempted alone!

levels.name: Rift Mastery
levels.description: Learn to extract greater amounts of Kryptis essence from rifts.
levels.instruction: Receive more Kryptis essences when closing rifts. Kryptis essences are powerful crafting materials used in baits, weapons, armors, and legendary armors.

levels.name: Obsidian Armor Crafting
levels.description: Gain access to final crafting recipes for legendary armor.
levels.instruction: The legendary Obsidian armor recipes can be bought from Lyhr in the Wizard's Tower.

levels.name: Wayfinder Mastery
levels.description:
Train this mastery to gain bonus effects:
• Add new services to the Wizard's Tower to upgrade Obsidian armor or to exchange various map currencies and materials.
• Open arcane chests with ease.
• Provide some protections against Eparch in the Citadel of Zakiros.
• Loot a daily coffer from the Into the Spider's Lair meta-event that contains particularly rare items.
levels.instruction:
Mastery over the Horn of Maguuma has granted multiple bonuses:
• Junior Archivist's Aide Conri can enhance Obsidian armor with a cosmetic upgrade! He can be found next to the Forge of Timelessness.
• Gharr Leadclaw can exchange currency, materials, and more! He can be found west of Empyrean Plaza next to a thornsprout bloom.
• Arcane chests take significantly less time to open.
• You are able to reduce the rate of emotion stacks Eparch consumes.
• Successful completions of the Into the Spider's Lair meta-event grant a daily reward that contains particularly rare items.

38.name: Heart of the Obscure Research
38.requirement: Complete the Guild Wars 2: Secrets of the Obscure story chapter Hell Breaks Loose to unlock the Heart of the Obscure Research Mastery track.

levels.name: Rift Guidance
levels.description: The Heart of the Obscure can be used to find small Kryptis rifts.
levels.instruction: Use your Activate Mastery Skill button to allow the Heart of the Obscure to guide you to a Kryptis rift if one is present.

levels.name: Updraft Generator
levels.description: Learn to channel the power of the Heart into updraft generators.
levels.instruction: Interact with an updraft generator to form a temporary updraft nearby. Updrafts can be used with flying mounts and gliders to reach inaccessible areas.

levels.name: Lesser Arcane Treasures
levels.description: Learn to use the Heart to unlock lesser arcane treasures in Secrets of the Obscure maps.
levels.instruction: Lesser arcane treasures are small treasure chests found in Secrets of the Obscure maps. Interact with them and perform a small skill challenge to open them for rewards.

levels.name: Ley-Loom Operation
levels.description: Learn to use the Heart to weave latent ley energy through ley looms into functional ley lines.
levels.instruction: Interact with a ley loom to cause a temporary ley line to form nearby. Ley lines can be used with flying mounts and gliders to reach inaccessible areas.

levels.name: Greater Arcane Treasures
levels.description: Learn to use the Heart to unlock greater arcane treasures in Secrets of the Obscure maps.
levels.instruction: Greater arcane treasures are large treasure chests found in Secrets of the Obscure maps. Interact with them and perform a skill challenge to open them for rewards.

39.name: Inner Nayos
39.requirement: Complete the Duress chapter of the Guild Wars 2: Secrets of the Obscure story to unlock the Convergence Mastery track.

levels.name: Sieging Fireball
levels.description: Learn to increase your skyscale's Fireball skill to deal siege damage.
levels.instruction: Your skyscale's Fireball can deal siege damage to objects.

levels.name: Wizard's Blessing
levels.description: Learn to gain Wizard's Blessing in Convergences when turning in essences.
levels.instruction: While in a Convergence, turning in essences grants you the Wizard's Blessing, increasing your combat effectiveness.

levels.name: Wisp Pockets
levels.description: Learn how to gather essences as a wisp in Convergences.
levels.instruction: You are now able to gather essences while you are a wisp in a Convergence.

levels.name: Essence Attunement
levels.description: Learn to carry the maximum load of essence in Convergences. When picking up essences, heal and get an effect.
levels.instruction: You can carry even more essence and receive healing and an effect when picking up essences.

levels.name: Convergence Mastery
levels.description: Learn how to extract bonus Kryptis essence from successful Convergences. Completing Convergences grants you an effect that allows you to gain more Kryptis essence when using motivations. Increase the chance to get unstable Kryptis motivations, which are used to open Convergences.
levels.instruction: Successful Convergences offer better rewards, give bonus Kryptis essence, and also grant a bonus to Kryptis essence earned from using motivations. Additionally, you have an increased chance to acquire unstable Kryptis motivations, which are used to open Convergences.
